text: Micranthocereus albicephalus is a species of plant in the family Cactaceae. It is endemic to Brazil. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry shrubland and rocky areas. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== ==Sources== * Taylor, N.P. 2002. Micranthocereus albicephalus. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. Category:Flora of Brazil albicephalus Category:Near threatened plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Micranthocereus albicephalus
